question: The total power measured in star three-phase circuit is given by
For power measurement of three phase circuit by two wattmeter method, When the value of power factor is less than 0.5 lagging?

answers.a: One of the wattmeters will read zero
answers.b: One of the wattmeter connections will have to be reversed
answers.d: Pressure coil of the wattmeter will become ineffective.

question: The dynamometer wattmeter can be used to measure
For a good 0.5 micro-farad paper capacitor, the ohm-meter reading should-

answers.a: Go quickly to 100 ohms and remain there
answers.b: Show low resistance momentarily and back off to a very high resistance
answers.d: Show very high resistance first and then low
